author: Pamela Muse
text:
An AZ member is interested in learning if you charge for a “call back” for garbage pick up.  That is, when a resident forgets to put their garbage can out and they call requesting drivers to come back, do you charge for that call back?  If so, how much.
You time is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Garbage Pickup "Call Back"
